reviewText: Viewed this last night and I can tell you it is a complete waste of time. After it ws finished, I felt bad for the couple that they could no longer enjoy their porn. Far from being an addiction, this family simpy became the victims of right-wing religious ideology. They went from something that was little more than entertainment to becoming the victims of a controlling ideology. A more appropriate title for this might be How We Gave Up Our Sexual Freedom to Become Slaves to Religous Whackery. So unless you already buy into some sort of extreme religion that basically hates sex, I don;t think you will enjoy this.
